snippet: Bob Diaco said he asked Don Patterson, his former boss, to be his associate head coach because he believes the Huskies can benefit from Patterson’s experience.
lead_paragraph: Bob Diaco said he asked Don Patterson, his former boss, to be his associate head coach because he believes the Huskies can benefit from Patterson’s experience.

headline.main: At UConn, Coach Digs Into Past for Help
headline.print_headline: At UConn, Coach Digs Into Past For Help
